hero.title: Transform Your Event with Smoothie Bikes!
hero.subtitle: Create unforgettable experiences with our pedal-powered smoothie stations. Fun, healthy, and eco-friendly entertainment for all ages!

intro.title: A Unique Experience For Every Occasion
intro.description1: Our smoothie bikes are available for rent throughout the region. Whether you're hosting a small family event or a large festival, we have a solution tailored to your needs.
intro.description2: All our packages include delivery, setup and takedown, as well as a professional animator to guide your guests through the experience. We also provide all fresh ingredients, cups, and other necessary accessories.

packagesGrid.title: Discover Our Packages
packagesGrid.subtitle: A unique and memorable experience for all types of events

help.title: Need Help Choosing?
help.description: Our team can help you select the perfect package for your event or create a completely customized solution.

testimonial.text: We booked Voilà Vélo Fruité for our corporate day and it was a resounding success! The team was professional and our employees loved the experience.
testimonial.author: Marie Lemieux

laPetiteKoki.title: La Petite Koki
laPetiteKoki.description: Ideal for small events up to 50 people
laPetiteKoki.heroDescription: Perfect for birthdays, daycare graduations, or family festivals, this package brings fun, laughter, and delicious smoothies to any celebration!

mainSection.title: What's Included?
mainSection.description: This package includes a kid-friendly blender bike, letting participants pedal to create their smoothies, making it a fun and interactive activity for all ages. We can customize this package with your branding, balloons, and personalized decorations!
includes: 1 kid-friendly blender bike (ages 5-10) – they pedal, they blend, they have fun!
Fresh, colorful smoothies – made on the spot with joy and energy
Lively animation – music and festive atmosphere everyone will remember
Customization possible with your branding, balloons, and decorations
Blended by your kids, powered by fun!

targetAudience.title: Who is it for?
targetAudience.description: This package is ideal for those who want to offer a unique and memorable experience for children, while promoting physical activity and healthy eating in a playful way.

options.title: Option 1
options.idealFor: Perfect for small birthday parties or intimate events.
includes: 25 delicious smoothies + 1 hour of energetic entertainment

options.title: Option 2
options.idealFor: Ideal for larger parties, daycare graduations, or family festivals.
includes: 50 delicious smoothies + 2 hours of energetic entertainment

popSolo.title: Pop Solo
popSolo.tagline: A guaranteed hit with teens, adults, and families!
popSolo.heroDescription: Perfect for school events, office parties, or any festive gathering focused on health and fun!

mainSection.title: What's Included?
mainSection.description: This package includes an adult blender bike, letting participants create their fresh smoothies while exercising. A perfect experience that combines fun, health, and social interaction. We can customize this package with your branding, balloons, and decorations!
includes: Festive atmosphere with music and good vibes
Blended by you, powered by fun!

customizationSection.title: Customize Your Pop Solo Experience
customizationSection.description: Adapt this package to your brand image and specific needs.
customizationSection.details: Full customization options available to make your event a unique and memorable experience.

targetAudience.title: Who is it for?
targetAudience.description: This package is ideal for school events, office parties, wellness workshops, store openings, and intimate gatherings—offering a personalized and memorable experience.

options.title: Option 1
options.idealFor: Perfect for small events and intimate gatherings.
includes: Festive atmosphere with music and good vibes

options.title: Option 2
options.idealFor: Ideal for medium-sized events and corporate celebrations.
includes: Festive atmosphere with music and good vibes

doubleFun.title: Double Fun
doubleFun.description: Two bikes for more fun and competition
doubleFun.tagline: Twice the bikes = twice the energy!
doubleFun.heroDescription: Perfect for community festivals, brand activations, fundraisers, corporate parties, open houses, and more!

mainSection.title: What's Included?
mainSection.description: This package includes two adult blender bikes, allowing for a larger-scale interactive experience. Perfect for creating a dynamic crowd atmosphere and engaging more participants at once. You can customize this package with your branding, balloons, and decorations—let us know to triple the fun!
includes: Full setup with tables and signage
Customization with your branding, balloons, and decorations

targetAudience.title: Who is it for?
targetAudience.description: This package is ideal for corporate team building events, community events, festivals, school fundraisers, and medium-sized parties—offering high-energy fun and friendly competition.

options.title: Option 1
options.idealFor: Perfect for community events and local festivals.

options.title: Option 2
options.idealFor: Ideal for brand activations and corporate events.

options.title: Option 3
options.idealFor: Perfect for large festivals and major events.

readySetBlend.title: Ready Set Blend
readySetBlend.description: For large events with many participants
readySetBlend.tagline: Team-building with a touch of health and energy!
readySetBlend.heroDescription: Perfect for corporate evenings, festive events, conferences, wellness challenges, and fun fundraisers!

mainSection.title: What's Included?
mainSection.description: This package turns smoothie making into a friendly competition! With two blender bikes, speed monitors, and a real-time scoreboard, your participants will enjoy a unique and motivating team-building experience. Make your event unforgettable with friendly competition and delicious rewards.
includes: Energetic animator to cheer the crowd
Smoothies made with your own pedal power

targetAudience.title: Who is it for?
targetAudience.description: This package is specially designed for companies and organizations looking to strengthen team cohesion while promoting health and well-being at work.

options.title: Option 1
includes: Energetic animator to cheer the crowd

parentChildChallenge.title: Parent-Child Challenge
parentChildChallenge.tagline: A family challenge they won't forget!
parentChildChallenge.heroDescription: Perfect for schools, festivals, family parties, or neighborhood events that want to bring generations together.

mainSection.title: What's Included?
mainSection.description: This unique package combines a child-friendly bike and an adult bike, creating an intergenerational experience where parents and children collaborate in a friendly competition full of laughter and bonding. Bonding, laughter, and delicious smoothies—all in one!
includes: Moments of bonding, laughter, and delicious smoothies in a single event!

options.title: Option 1
options.idealFor: Perfect for small family events and intimate celebrations.

options.title: Option 2
options.idealFor: Ideal for family festivals and large community events.
includes: 100 smoothies + 3 hours of energy and fun

targetAudience.title: Who is it for?
targetAudience.description: This package is perfect for creating strong family bonds while offering a fun and healthy experience that will appeal to both parents and children.

laSmoothieParade.title: The Smoothie Parade
laSmoothieParade.tagline: A parade of flavours for large events!
laSmoothieParade.heroDescription: Our largest standard package – perfect when you need to serve big crowds and create a real spectacle.

customizationSection.title: Make Your Parade Unforgettable
customizationSection.description: Full visual and experiential customisation so your brand shines in front of thousands.
customizationSection.details: Custom wheel covers, branded cups, themed decorations, music programming and more — ask us for the full list!

mainSection.title: What's Included
mainSection.description: This package features 4+ smoothie bikes, multiple serving stations and a full team of professional animators to keep the energy high for hours.

targetSection.title: Perfect For
targetSection.description: Designed for large-scale events that need a headline attraction capable of keeping crowds entertained and engaged for hours.

targetAudience.title: Perfect For
targetAudience.description: Ideal for city festivals, corporate gatherings, major fund-raisers and any situation where you need to wow a large audience.

options.title: Standard Parade Setup
options.idealFor: Great for medium-sized festivals and community events.

signature.title: Signature Package
signature.heroDescription: Let us create a completely customized smoothie bike experience tailored to your specific needs and vision.

mainSection.title: What's Included
mainSection.description: Whether it's a corporate gala, brand activation or private celebration, this fully bespoke package lets you showcase your identity – smoothie-style! Contact us to make your vision a reality.

targetSection.title: Perfect For
targetSection.description: This premium package is designed for brands and organisations that demand excellence and want to deliver a truly unique, memorable experience.

customizationSection.title: Create the Perfect Signature Experience
customizationSection.description: Fully bespoke design so every detail reflects your brand and event goals.
customizationSection.details: In-depth consultation, exclusive graphic design and flawless execution for a one-of-a-kind experience.

options.title: Fully Custom Signature Package
options.idealFor: Perfect for events that require complete customisation and premium service.
